subject: RE: [junit] Need example JUnit tests to validate Test Mentor's support of JUnit
msgSnippet: If you build with Ant then you have access to the junit task and other goodies that will allow you to become the uber builder of your dreams.
messageBody:
If you build with Ant then you have access to the junit task and other goodies
that will allow you to become the uber builder of your dreams.


http://jakarta.apache.org/ant/index.html


-H

--- mrettig@... wrote:
> Michael Silverstein wrote:
> >I threw together a screen capture to illustrate at:
> >http://www.silvermark.com/evaluators/5.3result_junit.html
>
> Is there a command line version, or an interactive API?
>
> I would probably want to integrate this tool into the build process, so I
> need a way to automate the testing and results. That way I can become a
> build nazi, and notify the offending programmer every time he/she checks
> in code that is not tested.
>
>
> Regards,
>
> Mike
